bcbioSingleCell
  • Reference
  • News

Sample Barcode Metrics

Sample Barcode Metrics

# S4 method for bcbioSingleCell
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

# S4 method for seurat
metrics(object, interestingGroups)

Arguments

object

Object.
interestingGroups

Interesting group, to use for colors.

Value

data.frame with cellular barcodes as rows.

See also

sampleMetadata().

Other Quality Control Metrics: plotCellCounts, plotGenesPerCell, plotMitoRatio, plotMitoVsCoding, plotNovelty, plotReadsPerCell, plotUMIsPerCell, plotUMIsVsGenes, plotZerosVsDepth

Examples

# bcbioSingleCell
bcb <- examples[["bcb"]]
metrics(bcb) %>% glimpse()
#> Observations: 18,240
#> Variables: 16
#> $ sampleID            <fctr> run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, run1_AGAGGATA, r...
#> $ nUMI                <dbl> 9659, 14095, 14053, 10666, 12359, 12660, 12909,...
#> $ nGene               <int> 3223, 4230, 4146, 3178, 3891, 4275, 3916, 2998,...
#> $ nCoding             <dbl> 8732, 12405, 11895, 9926, 11261, 11627, 11533, ...
#> $ nMito               <dbl> 290, 781, 1251, 190, 338, 410, 476, 843, 479, 3...
#> $ log10GenesPerUMI    <dbl> 0.8803814, 0.8740139, 0.8721868, 0.8694520, 0.8...
#> $ mitoRatio           <dbl> 0.03002381, 0.05540972, 0.08902014, 0.01781361,...
#> $ nCount              <int> 131259, 128690, 126962, 125515, 124799, 120160,...
#> $ sampleName          <fctr> M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_s...
#> $ description         <fctr> run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1, run1...
#> $ fileName            <fctr> 20170915_Pool_ZG4780-1_S1_R1_001.fastq.gz, 201...
#> $ index               <fctr> 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2, 2...
#> $ sequence            <fctr> TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCTCT, TATCCT...
#> $ sampleNameAggregate <fctr> M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1, M1...
#> $ revcomp             <fctr> AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGATA, AGAGGA...
#> $ interestingGroups   <fctr> M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_seq_rep_1, M1_s...

# seurat
seurat <- examples[["seurat"]]
metrics(seurat) %>% glimpse()
